net plastic neutral contact lens*

Experience superior vision, all-day comfort, and everyday value with Ray-Ban® 1-DAY contact lenses. Enjoy the convenience of a 1-day contact lens and feel good making a positive impact on the environment.** Ask your doctor about Ray-Ban® 1-DAY today.

Ray-Ban® 1-DAY

  • The perfect contact lens for your everyday life
  • Made of soft, flexible silicone hydrogel for comfort and breathability
  • A great way to get into 1-day lenses at a great value

Other reasons to choose
Ray-Ban® 1-DAY

The first environmentally conscious contact lens:

For our planet

  • In partnership with Plastic Bank®* and through their global network, Ray-Ban strives to reduce ocean-bound plastic waste by collecting and converting an equal amount of plastic for every Ray-Ban® 1-DAY contact lens sold.

For the greater good

  • Plastic waste collectors in coastal communities receive a premium for the materials collected. It helps them with basic family necessities, from groceries to school tuition and health insurance.
